for_sales.sales_text: Exceptionally fast Falmouth Working boat. Rigged as an open boat, day sailor with racing rig, Lena underwent a full rebuild in 2019/2020 including all new hollow mast and spars by Nobles, new sails by SKB, hull epoxy primed and finished in 2 pack Jotun above water, 7 coats coppercoat underwater,  Nedoplast deck,  Nanni 10 hp inboard diesel with new stern gear and folding prop along with swept wooden deck. Lena is finished with a considerable amount of varnished iroko and mahogany gunwhales, strakes and combings. Hanked on staysail, jib on Wykham Martin furler. A single bunk is fitted under the foredeck for overnight camping. Substantial drying legs and full cover by SKB sails. Could be shipped to Poole

boat.full_description: Tony Arthur purchased the hull in 1978 for self fit out - David  Spargo sold her in 1995. In Dec 2009  Soren Poulsen bouight her and took her to Denmark. Her current owner brought her from Sweden down to St Malo by road transport, and then by water across to Jersey
boat.name: Lena
boat.short_description: Lena is a Heard 23, bought as a bare hull and fitted out by her first owner.
